languages.text: "Каждая часть долга арбитра одинаково важна. Но я, как и Соломон, люблю действие".
"All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."
languages.original_text: "Каждая часть долга арбитра одинаково важна. Но я, как и Соломон, люблю действие".

traits.locale_text: "All parts of the Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."
"All parts of the Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."
"All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."
"All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."
"All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."
"All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."

languages.text: "Alle Pflichten eines Arbitrators sind gleichermaßen wichtig. Aber wie Solomorne bevorzuge ich Taten."
languages.original_text: "All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Pflichten eines Arbitrators sind gleichermaßen wichtig. Aber wie Solomorne bevorzuge ich Taten."

languages.text: « Tous les devoirs d'un arbitrator sont aussi importants les uns que les autres, mais à l'image de Solomorne, je préfère l'action. »
languages.original_text: "All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les devoirs d'un arbitrator sont aussi importants les uns que les autres, mais à l'image de Solomorne, je préfère l'action. »

languages.text: 「アービトレイターの任務はすべて同じくらい重要です。ですが、私はソロモーンのように、戦闘行動を好みます」
languages.original_text: "All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターの任務はすべて同じくらい重要です。ですが、私はソロモーンのように、戦闘行動を好みます」

languages.text: «Todas las partes del deber de un Arbitrator son igualmente importantes, pero, al igual que Solomorne, prefiero la acción».
languages.original_text: "All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."

traits.locale_text: «Todas las partes del deber de un Arbitrator son igualmente importantes, pero, al igual que Solomorne, prefiero la acción».

languages.text: “法务官的言谈与行动同样重要。不过，我和索罗蒙一样，也是个行动派。”
languages.original_text: "All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."

traits.locale_text: “法务官的言谈与行动同样重要。不过，我和索罗蒙一样，也是个行动派。”

languages.text: "Yargıcıların her bir vazifesi eşit derecede önemlidir. Gelgelelim ben de Solomorne gibi işin aksiyon tarafını daha çok seviyorum."
languages.original_text: "All parts of an Arbitrator's duty are equally important. But much like Solomorne, I prefer action."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcıların her bir vazifesi eşit derecede önemlidir. Gelgelelim ben de Solomorne gibi işin aksiyon tarafını daha çok seviyorum."
